title: E-commerce Ad Spend Benchmarks: Where Does Your Brand Stand in 2026?
excerpt: We analyzed thousands of e-commerce brands to bring you the definitive ad spend benchmarks for 2026. Find out how your metrics stack up across Meta, Google, and TikTok.
author: metricx-team

content.text: Understanding where your ad spend metrics fall relative to industry benchmarks is crucial for strategic planning. We've aggregated data across thousands of e-commerce brands to provide the most accurate benchmarks available.

In 2026, the average ROAS across all e-commerce verticals is 3.2x for Meta Ads, 4.1x for Google Ads, and 2.5x for TikTok Ads. However, top-performing brands consistently achieve 5-8x ROAS on their best-performing platforms.

CPA has increased 15% year-over-year across all platforms. The most significant jump came in fashion and apparel (22% increase), while health and beauty saw a more modest 8% increase. Brands using multi-platform strategies saw 30% lower CPAs on average.
Brands spending $10K-$50K/month allocate 55% to Meta, 35% to Google, and 10% to TikTok on average. Larger brands ($100K+/month) shift more budget to Google (45%), with Meta at 40% and TikTok at 15%.
